alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duval County through 415 PM EDT... At 347 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverside, or over Jacksonville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Arlington, Ortega, Normandy, San Marco, Riverside and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
